last_episode_to_air.name: Major Changes for Six
last_episode_to_air.overview: A couple and their four kids desperately want to update their space, and they're ready to make some major changes. Their land and location is perfect, and they plan to stay for the long haul, so they reach out to Jackie and Trecie to help with the design plan and renovations.

name: Mountain Mamas
overview: People are moving to Montana in droves and move-in ready properties are getting scooped up quickly. Real estate mavens Jackie Wickens and Trecie Wheat Hughes help clients sort through a variety of historic homes from log cabins to ranch houses in need of a little TLC. With Trecie's sharp design sense and Jackie's contruction know-how, they'll find their clients diamonds in the rough and transform them into Montana dream homes.

episodes.name: Rustic Dream Home in Montana
episodes.overview: First-time homebuyers move back to Montana to start a family. After debating between living in a quaint Old West town or in the country with majestic mountain views, the couple gets Jackie and Trecie to start the renovations. Their combined construction experience and design chops leave the couple in good hands when it comes to turning their Montana forever home dream into a reality.

episodes.name: Home With Room to Roam
episodes.overview: A mother and daughter move back to Montana from Texas and are looking for a home with plenty of land. They currently have horses and dogs spread out with friends and family and need Jackie and Trecie's help to find a place to bring their family back together.

episodes.name: Grandparents Arrive From Germany
episodes.overview: A couple expecting a child needs help, so his parents are moving from Germany to give them a hand. The couple are excited for Trecie and Jackie to help them find the grandparents a nearby home with a European-inspired design.

episodes.name: Wisconsin to Montana
episodes.overview: A family is moving from Wisconsin to find their forever home in Montana. They are hoping to find a property with beautiful mountain views, large on enough for their archery hobby and is still be within their budget.

episodes.name: Surprise Option in Bozeman, Montana
episodes.overview: A couple and their young son have outgrown their house. They are searching for a new home near Bozeman, MT, with enough land to let their animals roam. Jackie and Trecie have a couple of properties with amazing views, but a surprise option could throw a wrench in their plans.

episodes.name: Craftsman Mountain Home Hunt
episodes.overview: A Virginia couple is ready to settle down and spend their golden years in a Montana dream home. They seek Jackie and Trecie's help finding a property that is big enough to accommodate their family and friends who visit often. They want something that has a mountain Craftsman feel with an amazing view, plus a big modern kitchen, bar area and outdoor patio for entertaining.

episodes.name: Modern Farmhouse Renovation
episodes.overview: Jeff and Sam have a full house with two girls, two dogs, a donkey, some chickens and a barn cat, and they are running out of living space. With Jackie and Trecie's help, they are hoping to increase their current living space and property value with a modern farmhouse-style renovation.

episodes.name: Expanding Mountain Home Upgrade
episodes.overview: Along with their two girls, Janis and Jennifer are outgrowing their home and need to address some rotting wood on the south wall. Jackie and Trecie step in to help upgrade and expand their home while working to stay under budget.

episodes.name: Major Changes for Six
episodes.overview: A couple and their four kids desperately want to update their space, and they're ready to make some major changes. Their land and location is perfect, and they plan to stay for the long haul, so they reach out to Jackie and Trecie to help with the design plan and renovations.
